name: Soccer Battle Royale
description: Imagine battle royal and soccer will be combined in one game. This is exactly this game, Soccer Battle Royale.
minimum_requirements: OS: Any Windows Version Processor: Intel Pentium D 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4400+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT or ATI Radeon X1950 Pro or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium D 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4400+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT or ATI Radeon X1950 Pro or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
